heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Anti-Money
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Anti-Money 
Laundering: Beneficial Ownership of Trusts) (Amendment) Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (anti-money laundering beneficial ownership trusts) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 10 July 2025.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 10 July 2025.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. The European Union (Anti-Money Laundering: Beneficial Ownership of
text_raw:
3. The European Union (Anti-Money Laundering: Beneficial Ownership of 

Trusts) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 194 of 2021) are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 27, by the deletion of paragraph (6), and 

(b) 

in Regulation 29 – 

(i) 

 in paragraph (1), by the substitution of “Regulation 27(1) 
or (3)” for “Regulation 27(1), (3) or (6)” in each place 
where it occurs, and 

(ii) 

 in paragraph (3), by the substitution of “Regulation 27(1) 
or (3)” for “Regulation 27(1), (3) or (6)”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 141, 5.6.2025, p.73 
2 OJ L, 2024/1640, 19.6.2024 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [311] 3
